channel.title: New Mob in 1.8
channel.description:
...Looks like a walking squids or something of the sort?
[IMG]http://media.minecraftforum.net/content/images/2011/07/new18mob.png[/img]
[IMG]http://media.minecraftforum.net/content/images/2011/07/18_2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://media.minecraftforum.net/content/images/2011/07/18_3.png[/img]
...Or is Notch just fucking with us?

item.title: New Mob in 1.8
item.dc:creator: @mironic mironic
item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:104, topic:406541"][quote author=mironic link=topic=503542.msg3699519#msg3699519 date=1312660719]

has anyone seen the slenderman tapes?

Got links?

Looks like I’m quittin minecraft.

They can’t possibly be that bad.

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Wmhfn3mgWUI

“marbleHornets” live documenty shows how real he actualy is, and how scary, although someparts look really fake… i still dont know… becuase some parts look to real… like you will see…

That was proved to be a fake made by SomethingAwful users KicksYouInHalf and Ce gars.

The Slenderman crap is a myth spawned by a SomethingAwful contest that introduced the first Slenderman (as a myth) appearance on June 10th, 2009.

:3… do more reserch it was first i think a Russian or German myth…
[/quote]that was part of the fake you moron…[/quote]
or was it You mormon.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mob in 1.8
item.dc:creator: @ratbagmasta ratbagmasta
item.description:
@ratbagmasta wrote:

I’m not sure if this will be awesome, or awful. In any case, looks like notch doesn’t want us to go fighting mobs in the night. Seems my nocturnal trips to get snow are over :c

Read full topic

item.title: New Mob in 1.8
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:99, topic:406541”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=503542.msg3697381#msg3697381 date=1312520811]

http://www.break.com/game-trailers/game/minecraft/minecraft-enderman-leak

lol holy shit that sound it makes when they come up behind you ima shit brix if i hear that shuffle sound

Yesterday there was something on Notch’s twitter about videos being fake, that nothing has been released except a picture. I believe these are just idiots who have adobe premier and such. I am not impressed at all.
[/quote]
well thats probs true because he isnt animated, plus he said they move extremely fast, so its probs fake[/quote]
It’s fake because he never looked directly at the enderman, and enderman apparently mind their own business if you do to.

Read full topic

item.title: New Mob in 1.8
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“mironic, post:92, topic:406541”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=503542.msg3696818#msg3696818 date=1312489625]

Great news about the pumpkin. I was really hoping Notch would add something to prevent them from chasing you, as it would have been a real pain trying to show someone new around on a server otherwise.

Yeah, I’m just glad we have a defense against these evil black men! They call you coonhunter for a reason… :rolleyes:

Actually his name means Raccoonhunter, he gets pissed when ppl say that :o unless your being sarcastic.

<3

Although i admit i said quite of racist things yesterday when some idiot pulled out infront of me while i was going 130+ on my bike. Too many bumps in the road to get a good look at my speed lol.

less than three right back atcha
[/quote]
less then less then three at you <<3[/quote]
HO SED I WUZ TAKIGN TO U GTFO NOB
[size=2pt]jk <3 u 2[/size]

Read full topic

Although i admit i said quite of racist things yesterday when some idiot pulled out infront of me while i was going 130+ on my bike. Too many bumps in the road to get a good look at my speed lol.

Racoonhunter*
Weirdest part was, he was white ._.
Jokes <3.
I have the strangest feeling that 1.8 will be released this week, though I’m probably wrong.
[/quote] i dought it.

item.description:
@mironic wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:80, topic:406541”]You guys realize as long as you never make ‘eye’ contact with the enderman, you have nothing to fear?
